name: Scrap Survivor (Group 22)
description:
Scrap survivor is a 2D puzzle platformer that will test a player's ability ton think ahead and manage resources. You play as a robot escaping from a recycling plan in the city. You are running out of system power so you must make it out of each level before your power runs out. Look out for Scrapper drones and saws too!

Instructions:
Make it to the end of the level without using up your boost or walk power. If you do then you lose the game. 

Space to jump/boost.
AD to move left and right.
WS to climb ladders.
K to interact with switches and map consoles.
